channels.name: Saudi Quran TV
channels.description: Saudi Quran TV is a renowned Islamic television channel broadcast from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, dedicated to the continuous recitation of the Holy Qur’an. The channel features beautiful and authentic Qur’anic recitations by esteemed Qaris and the Imams of the Haramain Sharifain (Masjid al-Haram and Masjid an-Nabawi). This channel serves as a source of spiritual peace, reflection, and guidance for Muslims around the world. Through its high-quality and soul-touching Tilawat, Saudi Quran TV helps strengthen faith, encourage regular Qur’an recitation, and create a serene Islamic atmosphere in homes and hearts.

channels.description: Bangladesh Television (BTV) is the state-owned national television channel of Bangladesh, providing a wide range of programming that includes news, cultural shows, documentaries, entertainment, educational content, and live events. With a focus on education, culture, and public service broadcasting, BTV remains a trusted source of information and entertainment for audiences across Bangladesh and the global Bangladeshi community.

The channel primarily features live coverage and recorded programs from Masjid an-Nabawi, including sermons, lectures, and guidance rooted in the Qur’an and Sahih Hadith. Sunnah TV plays an important role in educating Muslims about Islamic manners, worship, and daily life according to the Sunnah. Through scholarly talks and spiritually enriching broadcasts, the channel helps viewers strengthen their faith, deepen their understanding of Islam, and follow the path of the Prophet ﷺ with clarity and devotion.
